column17:
Product Description

Isharya is a premium costume jewelry brand epitomizing modern Indian glamour. Inspired by India’s intricate and vibrant style Isharya blends modern techniques with heirloom details to create on trend high quality jewelry that is provocative and sophisticated yet available at accessible price points. The collection fuses a modern California chic aesthetic with the allure of Bollywood glamour for a truly global feel. Make a vibrant statement with the array of collections in our Gem Rocks category a line that puts a lively twist on classic shapes and silhouettes while showcasing the beauty of semi-precious stones. Encompassed with fine 18k gold plating this group includes a number of elegant and finely polished stones like amazonite jasper jade carnelian blue lapis onyx druzy agate and mother of pearl.
